contents: Purpose: to permit the construction of a multiple family residential development above underground parking. The proposed development is Phase 1 of the Willingdon Lands Urban Village Master Plan. The development is comprised of three buildings: a six-storey non-market rental building, a 14-storey market rental and non-market rental building, and a 20-storey leasehold strata building with street-oriented townhomes(Item 6.3., Administrative Report, Council September 25, 2023)Subject to approval of Item 6.3.
